overview:
Five Years of Experience in .com industry, with extensive hands on experience of internet/web marketing with SEO (Search Engine Optimization) and Other Online Marketing Channels like Pay Per Click, Pay Per Lead, Social Media Marketing, E-Mail Marketing.

Most Recently Zeeshan Ali has optimized and started WorldofTrade.com that is at its excellence now and generating business, Also Zeeshan Ali is founding his own company MediaRedirect.com (Under Construction) for better expanding his self, for temporarily people can visit WebMarketingSEOs.com for an overview
